abstract: Six years ago, Jeff Price founded TuneCore to promote a different way of distributing music online, and tracking royalties. On Wednesday, he announced that he had been fired.
snippet: Six years ago, Jeff Price founded TuneCore to promote a different way of distributing music online, and tracking royalties. On Wednesday, he announced that he had been fired.
lead_paragraph: 2:40 p.m. | Updated In a surprise change that could have consequences for thousands of independent recording artists, the founder of TuneCore, a digital music distribution company, has been fired by the company’s board.

headline.main: Founder of Digital Music Company Is Ousted, and Theories Abound
